listitem.para: const SIMPLEPIE_USERAGENT SIMPLEPIE_NAME . '/' . SIMPLEPIE_VERSION . ' (Feed Parser; ' . SIMPLEPIE_URL . '; Allow like Gecko) Build/' . SIMPLEPIE_BUILD
const SIMPLEPIE_LINKBACK '' . SIMPLEPIE_NAME . ''

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_BUILD
section.para:
SimplePie Build
A faire
Hardcode for release (there's no need to have to call SimplePie_Misc::get_build() only every load of simplepie.inc)

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_CONSTRUCT_MAYBE_HTML
section.para: A construct that might be HTML

para.computeroutput: const SIMPLEPIE_LINKBACK '' . SIMPLEPIE_NAME . ''

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_ALL
section.para:
All Feed Autodiscovery Voir également
SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_AUTODISCOVERY
section.para:
Feed Link Element Autodiscovery Voir également
SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_BODY
section.para:
Local Feed Body Autodiscovery Voir également
SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_LOCAL_EXTENSION
section.para:
Local Feed Extension Autodiscovery Voir également
SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_BODY
section.para:
Remote Feed Body Autodiscovery Voir également
SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_LOCATOR_REMOTE_EXTENSION
section.para:
Remote Feed Extension Autodiscovery Voir également
SimplePie::set_autodiscovery_level()

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG
section.para: Wrong Media RSS Namespace. Caused by a long-standing typo in the spec.

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG2
section.para: Wrong Media RSS Namespace #2. New namespace introduced in Media RSS 1.5.

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG3
section.para: Wrong Media RSS Namespace #3. A possible typo of the Media RSS 1.5 namespace.

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG4
section.para: Wrong Media RSS Namespace #4. New spec location after the RSS Advisory Board takes it over, but not a valid namespace.

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_MEDIARSS_WRONG5
section.para: Wrong Media RSS Namespace #5. A possible typo of the RSS Advisory Board URL.

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_RSS_20
section.para: RSS 2.0 Namespace (Stupid, I know, but I'm certain it will confuse people less with support.)

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_NAMESPACE_W3C_BASIC_GEO
section.para: W3C Basic Geo (WGS84 lat/long) Vocabulary Namespace

section.title: SIMPLEPIE_TYPE_RSS_SYNDICATION
section.para: Non-RDF-based RSS (truly intended as syndication format)

para.computeroutput: const SIMPLEPIE_USERAGENT SIMPLEPIE_NAME . '/' . SIMPLEPIE_VERSION . ' (Feed Parser; ' . SIMPLEPIE_URL . '; Allow like Gecko) Build/' . SIMPLEPIE_BUILD
